about_the_game:
ESCAPE FROM ANCHOR game is a 2D pixel wind shooting game with Cthulhu theme, which is a collection of firearms modification, map exploration, and death falling equipment. In the game, you will play as an agent who enters the blockade area to investigate and find out the cause of strange events in the blockade area. Your character is trapped in a sealed off area, having to search for various supplies such as food and water, seeking opportunities to survive, and also completing exploration missions, collecting intelligence, and finding the truth. During this process, don't be too surprised to encounter anything unnatural, whether it's going back in time or into the future.

Experience exhilarating shooting, fight to the death against hostile agents, K-type monsters, etc., and use your weapons to uncover the truth of the world! If you are poor, tactics will be interspersed; if you are rich, firepower will cover; everything is up to you!

We strive to provide you with the thrill of 2D shooting and give you a real shooting experience.

Up to hundreds of firearm accessories allow you to freely customize your own weapons!

Recruit agents for your exploration mission and cultivate them to become excellent agents, helping you complete various tasks and search various maps.

Every exploration of the map is like jumping back and forth on the edge of life and death for the detective, and different maps have different probabilities of causing the detective to die directly.

Explore the map carefully to ensure that your agents return safely to the base every time.

If the detective unfortunately dies or is seriously injured and returns to the city, both the items he carries and the items he searches for will fall. Only items placed in the safe can be retained.
